title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Welcome into the Best of The Herd with Colin Cowherd! Colin's impressed by the recent surge from the Dallas Cowboys explaining how insanely talented they truly are. Some people can always suck you back into their lives and that's Josh Allen with the Buffalo Bills. The Green Bay Packers are a heavyweight boxer that keeps proving they can't knock anyone out including the Cleveland Browns. Plus, another riveting edition of "Where Colin was Right / Wrong!"

Guest: Jordan Palmer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
